title: Buffalo Bills play football and learn soccer
text:
Buffalo Bills play football and learn soccer 
Updated: Wednesday, October 21 2015, 06:30 PM EDT 
13WHAM's Mike Catalana reported from Regent Street in London Tuesday. 
That street will be shut for six hours Sunday as the Buffalo Bills take on the Jacksonville Jaguars. 
On their day off, 14 Buffalo Bills players went to the Tottenham Hotspur Premier League training facility to work and play with some young kids. 
Toby Motkya tells us how Marcel Dareus relived his middle school glory days. Buffalo Bills play football and learn soccer Related Stories
